backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with storage mixin and extensive type definitions for players, lobbies, tournaments, transactions, game states, and admin stats.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains generated summaries of various frontend files describing their roles, behaviors, and recent fixes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling game modes, wallet initialization, admin checks, quickâ€‘play flow, and tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: Admin dashboard for viewing platform stats and updating the house cut percentage with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: UI badge showing backend connection, retry attempts, and error details using useActorWithRetry.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: Modal handling deposit and withdrawal flows, including Flexa payment status polling, wallet interactions, and form validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with wallet connect, mode toggle, deposit/withdraw controls, and branding.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Card showing live app URL and backend build metadata with copy-to-clipboard and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: Lobby overview with placeholder alerts and Quick Play buttons for Spades and Omaha.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Placeholder lobby room card indicating multiplayer features are under development.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting users to create a profile based on game mode, handling both online and offline profile creation.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Basic game screen wrapper showing title, mode, exit button, and a placeholder game interface.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: Displays a tournaments section with dynamic text and badges based on game mode and placeholder content for upcoming tournament features.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Provides a modal for WalletConnect integration with mobile detection, QR/URI copy, and deep links to major wallets.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Shows a modal prompting users to install a Web3 wallet, offering links to Coinbase Wallet and MetaMask extensions.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Renders wallet stats, balances, and transaction history for online or offline modes with modals for deposits and withdrawals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with retry, error detection, and connection status tracking for backend connectivity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous frontend data types and React Query hooks for fetching and mutating canister data such as user profiles and build metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: Implements a Web3 wallet hook handling wallet detection, connection, balance fetching, chain switching, and guest wallet generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Provides Tailwind base styles, theme variables, animations, and custom UI utilities including gradients, scrollbars, and button effects.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Contains placeholder Web3Modal integration setup with Base chain metadata and app wallet metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings with OKLCH-based design tokens.
project_state.json: Defines the overall dApp state, including frontend architecture, backend canister design, payment integrations, and known limitations. Captures React/IC integration patterns, dual offline/online modes, and unresolved implementation gaps across lobbies, payments, and gameplay.
